articles.title: Shami's participation in IPL 2024 in doubt due to ankle injury - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: India fast bowler has been missing in action since the final of the ODI World Cup in November 2023
articles.content: Mohammed Shami had played the ODI World Cup last year while taking injections to manage his ankle injury  •  PTI
